data.eml:eml: New Sericosura (Pycnogonida: Ammotheidae) from deep-sea hydrothermal vents in the Southern Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arango, Claudia P., Linse, Katrin (2015): New Sericosura (Pycnogonida: Ammotheidae) from deep-sea hydrothermal vents in the Southern Ocean. Zootaxa 3995 (1): 37-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3995.1.5
